title: E2E Test failures
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the gitter room instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**
<!--A clear and concise description of what the bug is and steps to reproduce it.-->
Every other time you run the E2E tests it will fail.

**Steps to Reproduce**
<!--Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error
-->
Run the E2E tests a few times over and eventually it will timeout.

**Dump**
<!--If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.-->
```
➜  lodestar git:(greg/validator/rpc) ✗ yarn test:e2e
yarn run v1.15.2
$ mocha -r ./.babel-register 'test/e2e/**/*.test.ts'


  [CLI] deposit
    ✓ Should make a deposit for single private key (946ms)
    ✓ Should make a deposit for 10 accounts derived from mnemonic (1827ms)

  Eth1Notifier - using deployed contract
    ✓ should process a Deposit log (134269ms)
    1) should process a Eth2Genesis log

  Eth1 dev network
    2) should start as configured
    ✓ should deploy deposit contract (1216ms)


  4 passing (3m)
  2 failing

  1) Eth1Notifier - using deployed contract
       should process a Eth2Genesis log:
     Error: invalid response - 0
      at exports.XMLHttpRequest.request.onreadystatechange (node_modules/ethers/utils/web.js:84:29)
      at exports.XMLHttpRequest.dispatchEvent (node_modules/xmlhttprequest/lib/XMLHttpRequest.js:591:25)
      at setState (node_modules/xmlhttprequest/lib/XMLHttpRequest.js:610:14)
      at exports.XMLHttpRequest.handleError (node_modules/xmlhttprequest/lib/XMLHttpRequest.js:532:5)
      at ClientRequest.errorHandler (node_modules/xmlhttprequest/lib/XMLHttpRequest.js:459:14)
      at Socket.socketErrorListener (_http_client.js:392:9)
      at emitErrorNT (internal/streams/destroy.js:82:8)
      at emitErrorAndCloseNT (internal/streams/destroy.js:50:3)
      at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:63:19)

  2) Eth1 dev network
       should start as configured:
     Error: Timeout of 2000ms exceeded. For async tests and hooks, ensure "done()" is called; if returning a Promise, ensure it resolves. (/Users/gregmarkou/Jobs/code/github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/test/e2e/eth1/dev/network.test.ts)
```
**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: <!--[e.g. ubuntu, OSX High Siera]--> OSX
 - Branch: <!--[Master]--> greg/validator/rpc
 - Commit hash: <!--[e8232]-->2b042f9e94d78ab
